description: This add-on allows you to read paper documents using the Scanvox software. To use it, go to the NVDA menu and select Scanvox.

translations.description: This add-on allows you to read paper documents using the Scanvox software. To use it, go to the NVDA menu and select Scanvox.
Mit dieser Erweiterung können Sie Papierdokumente mit der Scanvox-Software lesen. Um es zu verwenden, gehen Sie zum NVDA-Menü und wählen Sie Scanvox.
Ce module vous permet de lire des documents papiers en utilisant le logiciel Scanvox. Pour l'utiliser, allez dans le menu NVDA et sélectionnez Scanvox.
This add-on allows you to read paper documents using the Scanvox software. To use it, go to the NVDA menu and select Scanvox.
This add-on allows you to read paper documents using the Scanvox software. To use it, go to the NVDA menu and select Scanvox.
Bu eklenti, Scanvox yazılımını kullanarak kağıt belgeleri okumanıza olanak tanır. Kullanmak için NVDA menüsüne gidin ve Scanvox'u seçin.
